lines.text: It must be some symbolism! I think it's symbolic of... junk.
I dunno much about psych'analysis, but I'd say dis is a doity pictcha!

This is cute... This is cute... This is nice... What the hell is it? I know what it is! It's Garbage! That's what it is! Two dollars I've paid for a French movie, for a foreign movie and I've got to see this junk...
Could this be the sex life of two things? Sure they can't show that on the screen! You get arrested! You have to pull the curtain!
I'm 71. I've got the right to be aloud, lady. I'm gonna die soon!

The fella that made this must be over thirty if they let him do this kind of thing, right? Why he waste his time with this? A fella like that probably can drive a truck... do something constructive... make a shoe...
What the hell is this? Must be a cartoon.
